headline: Macy's Confirms 66 Store Closures as Part of Bold New Chapter Strategy
summary: M closes 66 stores under its Bold New Chapter strategy, prioritizing 350 key stores and digital upgrades to meet evolving consumer needs.

raw.headline: Macy's Confirms 66 Store Closures as Part of Bold New Chapter Strategy
raw.summary: M closes 66 stores under its Bold New Chapter strategy, prioritizing 350 key stores and digital upgrades to meet evolving consumer needs.

headline: Deckers Outdoor target raised, added to ‘Tactical Outperform’ list at Evercore
summary: Evercore ISI raised the firm’s price target on Deckers Outdoor (DECK) to $235 from $195 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares, which the analyst added to the firm’s “Tactical Outperform” list. Heading into the fiscal Q3 report, the firm says its channel checks suggest that both of the company’s two main brands, HOKA and UGG, did well post back-to-school season. The firm maintains its FY25 EPS forecast, but raised FY26/27 EPS estimates by 3% and 4%, respectively, and is now 3% above Street

headline: Footwear Stocks Q3 Recap: Benchmarking Crocs (NASDAQ:CROX)
summary: Looking back on footwear stocks’ Q3 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including Crocs (NASDAQ:CROX) and its peers.
